about_the_game:
“Your skull is ripe for the taking.”
- Angron

Lead the World Eaters to victory as their Primarch! Celebrate the Warhammer SKULLS event by becoming Angron with this SKULLS bundle! Gather the bloodthirsty World Eaters before commanding them into battle with the Angron SKULLS DLC bundle, which includes:

  • A legendary Warlord: Angron, Primarch of the World Eaters
  • 12 World Eaters crates: each crate contains 5 cards. At least 3 of them will be World Eater cards, including a rare or better one
  • An exclusive premium Angron avatar cosmetic: customize your profile and become the incarnation of pure rage
  • 5 event entry tickets: take part in events to unlock amazing new content into the game and complete your collection!

Sharpen your axes and gather the World Eaters for the harvest of skulls! Don’t miss your chance to get a big boost to your collection and honour Khorne with unbridled fury. Blood for the Blood God! Skulls for the Skull Throne!

After purchasing this DLC, it will become available to collect within the game the next time you open it.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, including infrequent strong language, depictions of violence and gore, and online interaction between players.

package_groups.title: Buy Warhammer Horus Heresy: Legions - World Eaters Skulls bundle

short_description: The time has come for the harvest of blood and skulls! Unlock the power of Angron into your collection with this exclusive DLC, including Angron, 12 World Eaters card crates, an exclusive Angron premium avatar cosmetic, and 5 event entry tickets.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Czech, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
